subject: Cruelty to Animals
Dogfighting
organizations: Humane Society of the United States
lead_paragraph: While debates continue to focus on whether Michael Vick deserves a second chance in football, the larger issue is Vick’s personal rehabilitation and the role he can play in discouraging animal abuse.
snippet: While debates continue to focus on whether Michael Vick deserves a second chance in football, the larger issue is Vick’s personal rehabilitation and the role he can play in discouraging animal abuse.
